description: Updates the assessment target that is specified by the ARN of the assessment target. If resourceGroupArn is not specified, all EC2 instances in the current AWS account and region are included in the assessment target.

parameters.name: assessmentTargetArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the assessment target that you want to update.

parameters.name: assessmentTargetName
parameters.description: The name of the assessment target that you want to update.
